meanings.sent1: The campfire crackled with crepitations all night long.
meanings.sent2: I heard crepitations coming from the old radio as it warmed up.
meanings.sent3: The crepitations of the bubble wrap popping made everyone in the office laugh.
meanings.sent4: The crepitations of the leaves underfoot sounded like a tiny applause.
meanings.sent5: The crepitations of the popcorn in the microwave filled the room with excitement.

meanings.definition: The act of making a crackling or rattling sound.
meanings.sent1: The sudden crepitations of the branches falling startled the hikers.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic identified the crepitations as coming from the engine.
meanings.sent3: The crepitations of the toddler's toy made the baby giggle uncontrollably.
meanings.sent4: The crepitations of the typewriter keys echoed through the empty room.
meanings.sent5: The crepitations of the rain on the roof created a soothing lullaby.
